detail_desc: Long dress in an airy cotton weave with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, buttons down the front, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined at the top.
Two pairs of slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, front and back pockets and narrow hems.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, sturdy cotton denim with a high waist, button fly and slim, straight legs with raw-edge hems.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Cropped top in a soft, fine, rib knit. Narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps.

Oversized shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back, and an open chest pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline in a contrasting colour and a gently rounded hem.
Vest top in jersey crêpe with scalloped edges.
Short, wide dress in light sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and wide, 3/4-length sleeves. Slightly longer at the back.

Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum movement with embroidery and hard-worn details. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and raw-edge hems.

Ankle-length dress in airy, pattern-weave fabric with stripes in shimmering metallic thread. Small frill trim around the neckline and a V-shaped opening with ties at the front. Smocked yoke front and back and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Long, voluminous sleeves and close-fitting cuffs with rounded edges and a covered button. The dress is wide and softly draping with a seam and flounce at the hem of the skirt. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a stand-up collar, zip at the top and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Transparent silicone smartphone case with an adjustable fabric neck cord.
Leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist and flared legs.
Soft, non-wired bras in microfibre with mesh and lace details. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.

Outdoor jacket in woven fabric with a double-layered hood, high collar and zip down the front. Padded front and back sections, zipped front pockets and fleece-lined raglan sleeves in sturdy jersey with inset jersey panels down the sides. Longer and gently rounded at the back. Partly lined.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and detachable, padded hood. Zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front, side pockets with a press-stud and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in a softly draping, woven Tencel™ lyocell blend with a square neckline and flutter sleeves with covered elastication over the shoulders. Open section at the back with wide ties at the back and a seam at the waist with covered elastication at the back. Flared, softly draping skirt. Soft cotton voile lining over the bust.
Blouse in an airy cotton weave with short, butterfly sleeves and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Pin-tucks at the top of the front, and a flounce around the neckline.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and slim legs.

Fitted top in sturdy, patterned jersey with a concealed zip at the back and 3/4-length sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Shaping seams front and back and decorative tabs at the sides with shiny metal buttons.
Three-strand metal necklace with chains in various designs, two decorated with a pendant.
Umbrella in transparent, printed plastic with a plastic handle. Length 77 cm.
Gently fitted, pattern-weave jacket with notch lapels, gathered, 3/4-length sleeves and flap side pockets. No fasteners. Lined.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Sturdy shopper in braided paper straw with round handles at the top, one with a decorative tassel, and a detachable imitation leather shoulder strap. Canvas lining with a drawstring closure. Depth 13 cm. Height 24 cm. Width 33 cm.
Long-sleeved dress in patterned organic cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Cable-knit polo-neck collar in a soft cotton blend containing some wool. Fleece lining front and back.
T-shirts in soft, organic cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Top in a crinkled viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps and gathers at the top, both front and back.
Pyjamas in soft jersey made from a cotton blend. Straight-cut top with short sleeves. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and gently tapered legs.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in soft, rib-knit merino wool with buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves and a hood with a pompom on top.
Lace bra with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short dress in cotton-blend sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, lined drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Chinos in an airy cotton weave with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets and skinny legs. Skinny Fit.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and elasticated hems.

Two-button jacket in twill containing some linen with notch lapels, a welt chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs. Unlined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
Tights in a soft, fine knit with an elasticated waist.
NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Fully lined bikini with an all-over print. Top with a wide flounce at the top that continues back over the shoulders. Matching bikini bottoms.
Flared skirt in an airy, patterned cotton weave with smocking at the waist.
Fine-knit mittens decorated with plastic beads. Flap at the front that can be fastened back with a button to reveal a pair of fingerless gloves.
Tube scarf in a soft knit with a wrapover front. Length approx. 34 cm, circumference approx. 55 cm.
Fitted T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.
Fitted jacket in washed, stretch denim with buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, and side pockets.

Calf-length, halterneck dress in patterned satin with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the back of the neck and an opening at the top front and back. Elasticated seam at the waist and a pleated skirt. Lined.
Leather slides with a padded, quilted foot strap. Leather linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Pyjama bottoms in lightweight fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Short jacket in patterned faux fur with a collar, concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front and side pockets. Lined.
Large metal earrings in the shape of a face. Length 9 cm.
Smartphone case in transparent plastic with pressed flowers. Fits iPhone 6-8.

Joggers in washed, stretch denim. Regular waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, a fake fly, side pockets, and welt back pockets. Slim legs with gathered seams and a visible zip at the hems.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
Tights with an elasticated waist. 20 denier.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low, V-shaped waist and medium coverage at the back.

Sleeveless, knee-length dress in softly draping jersey with a small stand-up collar and an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Pleats at the shoulder seams to create draping at the top, and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Rib-knit jumper in soft chenille yarn. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and ribbing around the neckline and hem.
Cropped sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Suede ankle boots with pointed toes, covered heels and elastication at the sides. Leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 4.5 cm.
Long dress in woven fabric with a deep V-neck at the back with tie details and draping. Long sleeves and a slit at the back. Lined.
Knee-length football shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and a print motif on one leg. Unlined.
Shorts in soft, patterned cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Two-strand thin metal chain necklace with round pendants. Adjustable length 43-50 cm.
Patterned bikini. Top with narrow shoulder straps and gathers at the front. Lined at the front. Bottoms with a frill trim at the sides and a lined gusset.

Pyjamas in a soft cotton blend. Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric in a longer style with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Leggings in soft, patterned jersey with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Pyjamas with a short top and bottoms in lightweight, ribbed jersey. Top with a round neckline and long sleeves. Bottoms with an elasticated, drawstring waist and straight legs.
Long-sleeved jersey top with a deep V-neck at the back with ties at the hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with raw edges and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long jacket in a soft weave with notch lapels, flap welt front pockets, a gently tapered waist and long sleeves. No fasteners. Lined.
Short, fitted lace dress with frills on the front and a zip at the back. Long sleeves and frilled seam at the waist. Jersey underdress with narrow shoulder straps.

Sleeveless, calf-length dress in a textured viscose weave with padded shoulders. Decorative, gathered seam and a slit at the front, and a long, concealed zip at the back with a hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck. Lined.
Soft slippers with a motif, loop at the back and anti-slip protectors on the soles.

Kangol x H&M. Padded and quilted shoulder bag with a glossy finish, zip at the top and a wide, detachable, adjustable shoulder strap in a jacquard weave. Recycled polyester lining. Height 17 cm. Width 25 cm. Depth 3 cm.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some alpaca wool with a ribbed turtleneck collar, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Bikini top in wide mesh with a racer back, padded inserts at the front and lined lower section.
Short dress in ribbed jersey with 3/4-length sleeves, smooth jersey panels at the sides, a seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Trousers in a patterned cotton weave with elastication and twisted ties at the waist, an open back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
